DOC.brief_summary: To test the uptake of four different cost sharing discounts for enrolling in the Weight Watchers weight loss program as well as outcomes (program attendance and weight loss) over 12 months.
DOC.brief_title: A Test of Different Degrees of Cost Sharing on Program Uptake and Attendance
DOC.criteria: 1. Must be employee of Vanguard Health Systems over the age of 18 2. Must have a BMI of 21 or greater 1. Must not be under the age of 18 2. Must not have a BMI lower than 21
